title: Does This Photograph Show Honduran Caravan Members Using an American Red Cross Tent?
subtitle: A photograph of a family resting in front of a tent labeled “Cruz Roja Mexicana” has, somehow, been presented as evidence that the American Red Cross provided caravan tents.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A photograph shows a family of Honduran caravan members resting in front of a tent provided by the American Red Cross.
